Sports and Clubs: Swimming and playing squash, Member, (i) Breach Candy Swimming & Bath Trust; (ii) Bombay Gymkhana and (iii) Cricket Club of India
Social And Cultural Activities: Actively pursuing the cause of propagating free job-oriented computer education to economically underprivileged students through NGO Sparsh. Committed to provide free service to over 100 needy schools in Mumbai covering over 1 lakh students. The program is an example of Public-Private-Partnership
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Listening to music; an avid jazz guitarist; tastes range from Indian Classical to blues; reading biographies and travelling
Special Interests: Conducting Free Eye Camps for the poor of Mumbai; providing spectacles, basic testing as well as cataract operations
Educational Qualifications: BBA (Bachelor of Science in Business Administration) Educated at Sydenham College, Mumbai and Boston University, USA
